name: linter-eslintx
description: ESLint linter provider with bundled v8 and v9 support.

useBuiltin.title: Use Bundled ESLint
useBuiltin.description: Use bundled ESLint when project doesn't have ESLint installed. Auto-detects v8 or v9 based on config format.

deleteOnOpen.title: Delete Project Lint on File Open
deleteOnOpen.description: Delete project-wide lint messages for a file when it is opened in the editor. Restart needed.

debugMode.title: Debug Mode
debugMode.description: Log ESLint detection info to developer console.
